original_text: They brought the curtains for the yard and the curtain for the entrance to the yard, with their poles and their bases. They brought all the ropes and the pegs to fix those things to the ground. They brought everything that the priests needed to serve the Lord in the tabernacle, the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 뜰의 포장들과 그 기둥들과 그 받침들과 뜰 문의 휘장과 그 줄들과 그 말뚝들과 성막 곧 회막에서 사용할 모든 기구와

sentences.original_text: They brought the curtains for the yard
and the curtain for the entrance to the yard
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마당 입구를 위한 휘장도 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: with their poles and their bases
and the pegs to fix those things to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 땅에 고정하기 위한 말뚝들을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: They brought everything that the priests needed
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 제사장들이 필요한 모든 것을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: to serve the Lord in the tabernacle
